source_objects.title: Marketing Fundamentals
source_objects.description: Need to learn marketing? Start with courese that introduce you to market research, marketing fundementals and more.

items.title: Consumer Behavior
items.headline: Understanding the process consumers go through before they make a purchase
objectives_summary: When a new smartphone is launched by iPhone or Samsung or Huawei, why do some people buy it on the first day, whereas, others don't?
Understanding the definitions of consumer behavior
Understanding why do consumer behave in a certain way

items.title: How to Create a Simple Strategic Plan
items.headline: Learn a Simple, 6-Step Process That Can Help You Create The Business and Life You Truly Desire
objectives_summary: Learn what a Strategic Plan is and how it can help you create the business you want
Learn the difference between a traditional Strategic Plan and a Simple Strategic Plan (and why you probably don't need to spend the time on a traditional plan)
Learn the difference between a Strategic Plan and a Marketing Plan and why you need both

items.title: 2021 Complete Marketing Masterclass #4 | SEO
items.headline: Session 4: Search Engine Optimization - Rank 1 on Google with Technical SEO, UX SEO, Keyword Research, Digital Marketing
objectives_summary: You'll be able to understand modern marketing, spread your ideas and gain empathy for those you seek to serve.
Lead a marketing team
Oversee marketing strategy

items.headline: Event management course helping turn accidental, occasional and new event planners into skilled events professionals

Create and design an event that excites your audiences
Effectively project plan and budget your events

items.title: Landing Page Fundamentals, Buyer Psychology, and Conversion

visible_instructors.title: Dan Johnston
visible_instructors.job_title: Location Independent Coach, Author, and Business Trainer
visible_instructors.name: Dan

items.headline: Use Proven Landing Page Strategies, Psychological Principles, and Copywriting Secrets To Increase Conversions and Profit
objectives_summary: You can expect to improve the conversion rate of your course listing, landing page, or website by 25-300%.
This course focuses on your 'landing page', which is the first page a visitor lands on, but it also provides plenty of ideas and strategies to plan optimize your overall website.
You will develop an ability to "understand the big picture" and analyze almost any website or landing page and find ways to improve it and increase sales.

items.title: An Introduction to Games Marketing
items.headline: The go-to-market guide that instructs you on how to plan and execute marketing activities for your game.
objectives_summary: Understand some effective methods and tools to market their game.
Understand basic games marketing theory and practice.

items.title: How to Become a Freelance Copywriter. Work from Home.
items.headline: Start a freelance copywriting business with this proven seven-day plan. Get paid to work from home as a copywriter
objectives_summary: How to build a portfolio that attracts clients
How to name your company
How to build a website that showcases your copywriting business

items.title: Cost Per Action Marketing: Create Your First CPA Campaigns
items.headline: Step by step formulas for creating highly profitable CPA campaigns.
objectives_summary: You’ll learn everything you need to now to get started right now to make money with CPA marketing.
We’ll start by giving you several reasons why you should try CPA if you haven’t already and we’ll give you a list of some of the most popular networks.
You’ll learn some cool strategies to make sure you’re accepted immediately after applying to CPA Networks.

objectives_summary: 1.  How to develop a marketing strategy.  2.  How to use market research to test their ideas.  3.  How to develop an effective marketing mix, including new products and advertising, 4)  How to write a complete marketing plan.
